divs: Sighting DetailsI just finished dinner with a friend , he left for home , soI went out to my parents backyard to lay back in a lounge chair. it was warm that night for November,.As I was lying there,I just kept staring in one spot , then I noticed the strangest thing.A ripple The spot I was looking at started to move over me. This object made no noise ,and as it was above me , I knew wht it was,boomarang shape ,about 50 yards wide,as wide as my parents back yard,lights white small lights, the size of the head of a flashlight,all over the object,it was black and blended in with the stars , it must of have been 150 -200ft , right on top of me. I remeber looking up , thinking,what next? Then I had a feeling I was beening watched,then I got this peaceful feeling. Then the craft started moving very slover over me & the house ,no noise ,nothing .I must have been in shock,could'nt move,then I bolted through the house to watch it pass. I saw nothing. I know that they look like the crafts ,they're real.
Summary: approached me in my parents back yard
trends: There have been 134 other sightings in Kansas City
